about_content.content: Hello, Iâ€™m a Dona, full stack software. Having hands own experience in developing web applications using Angular & Spring Boot. I consider myself as a passionate learner, responsible and very punctual. I completed all my works with my full satisfaction and also ensure my complete presence of mind for the particular work.

Before describing detailed about my professional interest and carrier goal, I'm a B-Tech graduate in Computer Science and Engineering and also completed a course and internship in J2EE. Currently I'm working as Software Developer at UST Global, Trivandrum. I'm looking forward to fly high to achieve a great carrier and happy life ahead by doing something good for which organization & great for my career.

description.list: Java and Angular developer with 4 years of professional excellence.
Good understanding of object oriented concept.
Hands on experience developing web applications using Angular, Spring Boot and various other technologies.
Worked on different phases of Software Development Life Cycle.
Experience in handling complex projects and rapidly evolving requirements
B-Tech Computer Science & Engineering graduate and completed an internship in J2EE.
Adaptable to work independently as well as a team member.
Ability to learn new technologies with minimal time period.
Able to work in high pressure and extended hours as per the project needs.
Willingness and ability to learn new technologies quickly.
